message.body: Just FYI, we are almost at copa. Not sure if its convenient for you or not but I'd love to see you
Danielle just now walked in the door from a trip she was away on. I'm making dinner now. How long are you around there for?
Well, I guess the doors open at 8 but we only really want to see the last two bands but I don't think there is re-entry so it would prob only work if you
And if not, no worries. Cj is planning a trip to visit April 17tg weekend...hitch a ride!
Ok. I wasn't expecting her to get back so late but I'll try. ...both.
